title: MoonPay joins rarified list of dual Bitlicense and New York Trust Charter holders
contentSnippet: The crypto payment firm's limited-purpose charter will enable MoonPay to offer digital asset custody and over-the-counter trading services.

title: TON Pulls Back After Ecosystem-Driven Rally as Traders Eye Key Support Near $1.50
contentSnippet: The token's price action points to fading buyer interest, with initial strong trading activity giving way to a sharp decline in participation.

title: JPMorgan offers investors chance to win big if Bitcoin’s price drops next year, but then rockets in 2028
contentSnippet: With JPMorgan's instrument, investors get a chance at a 1.5x upside, a fixed return if IBIT is flat in a year, and some downside protection.

title: Exodus primed for more stable, fintech-like revenue after W3C acquisition: Benchmark
contentSnippet: Benchmark says W3C gives Exodus meaningful card-issuing scale that could drive longer-term growth.

title: Anthropic Completes AI Model Upgrades With Claude Opus 4.5—And Slashes Prices
contentSnippet: Anthropic released Claude Opus 4.5, completing its three-model lineup upgrade with benchmark-topping coding performance and a dramatic 67% price cut.

title: Homegrown NYC startup Polymarket allowed to resume US operations following CFTC reversal
contentSnippet: The CFTC issued an amended order allowing Polymarket, a crypto-based prediction-market platform, to resume operations in the U.S.

title: ICP Clears Key Technical Barrier as Breakout Volume Confirms Upward Momentum
contentSnippet: Internet Computer climbed through the crucial $4.20 resistance level on elevated volume before late-session consolidation narrowed gains.

title: BONK Breaks Through Overhead Resistance as Volume Jumps 85% Above Average
contentSnippet: Increased trading volume carried BONK through a major resistance threshold before late pullbacks shaped a new support band.

title: Crypto is GREEN! MON launches at $3.9Billion FDV!
contentSnippet: Crypto majors rallied alongside a broad market surge, with BTC up 2% to $87,400, ETH up 4% to $2,920, BNB up 1% to $850, and SOL up 5% to $136, while KAS (+22%), ENA (+13%), and SUI (+11%) led the day

title: Klarna Will Launch Stablecoin on Tempo in Effort to 'Challenge Old Networks'
contentSnippet: Klarna, a Swedish fintech company that provides “buy now, pay later” services, is launching its own stablecoin on layer-1 network Tempo.

title: Why Bitcoin Is Underperforming Equities Despite Bullish Catalysts
contentSnippet: Gains in AI-fueled stocks and heavy crypto leverage have widened the gap between bitcoin and equities.

title: Polymarket Secures CFTC Approval for Regulated U.S. Return
contentSnippet: Polymarket’s amended CFTC designation paves the way for the prediction-market platform to formally reopen in the U.S. with a fully regulated exchange structure.

title: Anchorage Digital Aims to Pay 'Rewards' on Ethena's Tokens Under GENIUS Act
contentSnippet: The U.S. stablecoin law prohibits paying interest on stablecoins, but Anchorage aims to offer a template to distribute yield-like rewards to token holders to stay compliant.

title: Stablecoin issuer Paxos acquires Fordefi, bolstering its crypto custody and wallet offering
contentSnippet: Fordefi offers an institutional-grade multi-party computation wallet solution that safeguards over $120 billion in monthly transaction volume.

title: MoonPay Secures New York Trust Charter, Expands Institutional Crypto Services
contentSnippet: The crypto payments firm joins an elite group with both a BitLicense and Trust Charter, gaining legal authority to custody assets and offer OTC trading under NYDFS oversight.

title: Paxos Acquires Crypto Wallet Startup Fordefi to Expand Custody Services
contentSnippet: The move aims to position Paxos to serve growing institutional demand for on-chain asset issuance and stablecoin payments.

title: BTC perp accounts turn heavily long as Binance long/short ratio surges to 3.87
contentSnippet: Just over a month ago, when BTC made an all-time high above $126,000, this ratio was sitting at multi-year lows below 0.6.

title: Polkadot Slides 4% as Technical Resistance Triggers Selloff
contentSnippet: The altcoin carved out a $0.21 trading range, marking 9% intraday volatility as bearish forces gained control.

title: Upbit Considering Appeal of $25M Fine by South Korea Regulator
contentSnippet: The country's largest crypto exchange said the Financial Intelligence Unit has been wrong in the past and had actions overturned in court.

title: BNPL firm Klarna announces USD stablecoin on Stripe–Paradigm’s Tempo blockchain to cut payment costs
contentSnippet: Klarna has unveiled KlarnaUSD, a USD-pegged token issued on Stripe and Paradigm’s Tempo blockchain, amid surging global stablecoin adoption.

title: Russian Man Detonates Airsoft Grenades in Botched Crypto Heist
contentSnippet: The amateurish robbery attempt at a crypto firm in Russia comes amid a global surge in violent crypto attacks.

title: Kraken pushes Krak as a bank alternative with new cashback debit card, salary deposits and high-yield vaults
contentSnippet: Kraken framed the Krak upgrades as a way for customers to "leave their bank behind and go all-in on crypto."

title: Morning Minute: Monad's $4B Debut
contentSnippet: It was a launch day that beat most expectations for the newest high-speed L1 blockchain.

title: Altcoin ETFs Including XRP, Solana in Green Amid Crypto Market Uncertainty
contentSnippet: Experts cite regulatory clarity and selective institutional reallocation as being behind recent capital inflows into XRP and Solana ETFs.

title: Metaplanet borrows another $130 million against its bitcoin holdings to buy more BTC
contentSnippet: The company said its 30,823 BTC reserve provides ample collateral headroom under the $500 million facility, with $230 million now drawn.

title: ETF outflows and macro data keep traders guarded as bitcoin’s ‘gentle recovery’ extends: analysts
contentSnippet: Analysts say ETF flows, onchain stress and critical macro data keep risks elevated despite bitcoin's modest rebound.

title: Cameo Wins Temporary Restraining Order Against OpenAI
contentSnippet: A federal judge has temporarily blocked OpenAI from using "Cameo" or confusingly similar marks for its Sora AI video generation products.

title: Japan's FSA to Require Crypto Exchanges Hold Liability Reserves for Losses Relating to Hacks
contentSnippet: Japan is seeking to restore trust in crypto markets after a decade of security failures, from Mt. Gox to the recent DMM Bitcoin hack.

title: Bitcoin Rebounds Above $88K—Will It Last?
contentSnippet: Bitcoin's weekend bounce is being supported by orderly derisking, a drop in bearish options hedging, and steady institutional conviction.

title: Binance Faces Fresh Lawsuit Over Alleged Hamas Transactions
contentSnippet: A court filing claims Binance’s structure and controls let users tied to U.S.-designated terrorist groups move funds through its exchange.

title: Memecoin market sinks to 2025 low as $5B wiped out in a day
contentSnippet: Both memecoins and NFTs have plunged to their weakest levels since early 2025, with traders pulling back from speculative assets across the board.

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump
contentSnippet: NFTs posted selective gains led by blue chips, while memecoins rallied broadly across major names in a sentiment-driven rebound.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days
contentSnippet: CoinGecko data shows the NFT market value has nearly halved in a month, with even top collections like BAYC and CryptoPunks losing ground.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.

title: Fear returns to the crypto market as $230B vanishes overnight
contentSnippet: Investor sentiment turned sharply bearish as crypto’s fear index plunged to 28, and $230 billion in value evaporated in a single day.

title: NFT markets rebound after $1.2B wipeout in Friday’s crypto crash
contentSnippet: Top Ethereum NFT collections like BAYC, Pudgy Penguins and CryptoPunks remain in the red despite a partial market recovery after Friday’s crypto market crash.

title: Sorare CEO still bullish on Ethereum despite ‘upgrading’ to Solana
contentSnippet: Fantasy sports crypto platform Sorare is migrating from Ethereum to Solana, with its CEO saying it is a better fit for Sorare due to its scalability and focus on consumer applications.
